items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available through a utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available and verified.
Bank and postal details verified with bank account and SWIFT code.
Directorship information is available but under review for verification status.
Tax documentation is available but pending additional review details.
Regulatory compliance data is under review for multiple regulation types, including AML.
Business scope details verified, highlighting its medium-scale operations and coverage.
Updated internal PEP screening data is available and verified through attachments.
Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for 2023 is reported and verified.
Market capitalization of 489,320 million dollars for 2023 is reported and verified.
